name: 1,3-bis(isocyanatomethyl)benzene
SMLTrestrictions: G34 Group Restriction No. 34 corresponds to FCM substance No. 421,988. Group restriction specification is expressed as 1,3-benzenedimethanamine.
Restrictions: SML(T) applies to the migration of its hydrolysis product, 1,3- benzenedimethanamine.To be used only as co-monomer in the manufacture of a middle layer coating on a poly(ethylene terephthalate) polymer film in a multilayer film.
